title: Contemporary Diamond Mangalsutra Necklace
materials: 18K Rose Gold; Black beads; Diamond with SI clarity.
features: This Mangalsutra features a delicate 18K rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads (Nalla Pusalu). The modern pendant is a square shape, encrusted with sparkling diamonds in a halo setting and Hyderabadi Polish for extra gleam.
description: A contemporary twist on a traditional symbol of marriage, this Mangalsutra is crafted with high-quality rose gold and dazzling diamonds. Its sleek design makes it perfect for everyday wear while retaining the cultural significance of a traditional mangalsutra. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making it a truly special piece.
